page.title: 14Farming on the Mendips.
page.content: {SPRING }- Its time for Muck Spreading, Fertiliser scattering and rolling the ground at my farm. The cows are out all day and we give hay, straw and cake to the calves.Milking is done twice a day and then we clean it out. Our 70 sheep have lambs and we feed any orphans.The Vet checks the stock. {SUMMER }-We have 140 cattle.Its Silage and Hay making time.A big machine collects the grass, chops it up and puts it in the trailer.We shear the sheep and then we dip them. {AUTUMN} -Its Muck Spreading and sheep dipping time again.We keep the cows in all the time now. {WINTER} -Hay is fed to the cows and calves.Beef cattle stay out in the fields and milking cows stay in the barn.We feed the sheep as well. If snow comes we check all the animals.
